title: BTC and ETH outlook as Crypto Markets hold tight throughout anxious sentiment
description: Crypto markets remain resilient despite broader volatility. Bitcoin consolidates above $100K, while Ethereum goes back in range after a breakout attempt. With total crypto market cap holding above $3T, investors eye digital assets as hedges amid geopolitical uncertainty and weakening sentiment.

title: MNIA: ATTop AI cloud mining platforms in 2025 for passive Crypto income – Secure Bitcoin & DOGE mining without hardware

title: Expats in Thailand offered a further tax holiday with bitcoin
description: In an ambitious move, the Thai finance ministry has announced that investors – Thai or foreign – will be exempt from paying tax on profits from their crypto gains provided they trade through exchanges or brokers licensed with the Thai Securities and Exchange Commission. The exemption runs from January 1 2025 through to the end […]

title: Pro-Israel hackers steal $90M in massive Iranian crypto heist — but may have lost all of the loot for good: reports
description: Coins like Bitcoin, Ethereum and Doge were sniped from digital wallets on Iranian exchange Nobitex.
